model.name: Brazza Wallet
model.disambiguatingDescription: The elegant design of Louis Vuitton's Brazza wallet is complemented by black Monogram Shadow calfskin, an extremely supple leather discreetly embossed with the iconic Monogram pattern. Inside, this classic wallet offers a variety of credit card slots and compartments, including a secure zipped one for coins.

additionalProperty.name: detailedDescription
additionalProperty.value:
• Monogram Shadow calf leather
  • Cowhide-leather lining
  • Black hardware
  • 16 card slots
  • 1 ID or business card slot
  • 1 large zipped compartment for coins
  • 4 inside flat pockets for bills and tickets
  • 1 gusseted bill compartment

The reference is either made in France, Spain, Italy or in the US.

panelInformations.title: Sustainability
panelInformations.description: The leather used in this product comes from a tannery audited and certified by the Leather Working Group (LWG), which is the highest environmental standard in terms of leather tanning. This standard requires tanneries to reduce their water and energy consumption, as well as their use of potentially hazardous substances. The tanneries we work with are located in Europe and are committed partners who work with us in our efforts for responsible sourcing and continuous improvement (implementation of material traceability systems, fighting against deforestation practices).

panelInformations.title: Product Care
panelInformations.description:
• Avoid rubbing or scratching your product against abrasive surfaces.
  • Avoid prolonged contact with any material that might transfer pigments to the Monogram Shadow leather (magazines, other leathers, etc).
  • Protect your product from humidity and keep it away from heat sources (radiators, car interiors during hot weather, etc).
  • Avoid direct exposure to sunlight. Prolonged exposure to sunlight may affect the coloration of your product.
  • Calfskin and cowhide leather scratch easily and can be damaged by greasy substances or solvents. Should it become soiled, wipe gently with a soft, dry, light-colored cloth (dark colors may transfer).
  • To protect your product when not in use, the felt protective pouch provided.


Taking proper care of your Louis Vuitton product will allow you to fully appreciate its beauty for many years.

For any enquiries about your product, please do not hesitate to contact any Louis Vuitton store.
panelInformations.introduction: To keep your Monogram Shadow product beautiful as the years pass, we recommend following these guidelines for its care :

model.name: Brazza Wallet
model.disambiguatingDescription: For those with plenty to carry & change, cards, notes 'sthe Brazza is an excellent choice. A convenient size that fits into most jacket pockets, it is also superbly stylish in Monogram canvas.

additionalProperty.name: detailedDescription
additionalProperty.value:
• 16 credit card slots
  • 1 ID or business cards slot
  • 1 large zipped compartment for coins
  • 4 inside flat compartments for bills and tickets
  • 1 gusseted bill compartment
  • Taurillon Leather
  • Cowhide Leather lining and trimmings

The reference is either made in France, Spain, Italy or in the US.

panelInformations.title: Sustainability
panelInformations.description: The leather used in this product comes from a tannery audited and certified by the Leather Working Group (LWG), which is the highest environmental standard in terms of leather tanning. This standard requires tanneries to reduce their water and energy consumption, as well as their use of potentially hazardous substances. The tanneries we work with are located in Europe and are committed partners who work with us in our efforts for responsible sourcing and continuous improvement (implementation of material traceability systems, fighting against deforestation practices).

panelInformations.title: Product Care
panelInformations.description:
• Beware not to scratch or rub your product against abrasive surfaces, especially the leather trim.
  • Keep your product away from damp or humid environments and avoid direct exposure to sunlight, keep your product away from any direct source of heat (radiators, car interiors overheated by the sun, etc).
  • Avoid contact with greasy substances, cosmetics, perfume, and hydroalcoholic solutions, as well as any material (magazines, other leathers, etc.) that may transfer their colored pigments onto the product.
  • Keep your product away from water. Should it get wet or dirty on the surface, dry with a lint free, light-colored, absorbent cloth. Never use soap or solvent.
  • If your lining gets dirty or in case of superficial stains, we recommend that you wipe it with a soft and light-colored cloth.
  • In order to protect your product when you are not using it, store it in the felt protective pouch provided.

Natural cowhide leather:
The trimmings are in natural cowhide leather, the skin is finished through a vegetal tanning process. Some natural marks or genuine irregularities in the leather may show through. Over time, this delicate leather, which is sensitive to scratches, will acquire a beautiful patina.

Taking proper care of your Louis Vuitton product will allow you to fully appreciate its beauty for many years.

For any enquiries about your product, please do not hesitate to contact any Louis Vuitton store.
panelInformations.introduction: To keep your Monogram canvas product beautiful as the years pass, we recommend following these guidelines for its care :

model.name: Brazza wallet
model.disambiguatingDescription: The classic Brazza men’s wallet is offered in signature Taiga cowhide, an embossed, dual-tone leather that is both supple and robust. The sleek design opens to reveal a leather-lined interior fitted with a multitude of slots, pockets and compartments: from cards to currency, coins to receipts, all the essentials are kept neat and well organized.

additionalProperty.name: detailedDescription
additionalProperty.value:

  • Taiga cowhide leather
  • Cowhide-leather trim
  • Cowhide-leather lining
  • Silver-color hardware
  • 16 card slots
  • ID or business card slot
  • Large zipped compartment for coins
  • 4 inside flat compartments for bills and tickets
  • Gusseted bill compartment

The reference is either made in France, Spain, Italy or in the US.

category.name: All Wallets and Small Leather Goods

panelInformations.title: Sustainability
panelInformations.description: The leather used in this product comes from a tannery audited and certified by the Leather Working Group (LWG), which is the highest environmental standard in terms of leather tanning. This standard requires tanneries to reduce their water and energy consumption, as well as their use of potentially hazardous substances. The tanneries we work with are located in Europe and are committed partners who work with us in our efforts for responsible sourcing and continuous improvement (implementation of material traceability systems, fighting against deforestation practices).

panelInformations.title: Product Care
panelInformations.description:
- Avoid rubbing or scratching your product against abrasive surfaces.- Avoid prolonged contact with any material that might transfer pigments to the Taiga leather (magazines, other leathers, etc).- Protect your product from humidity and keep it away from heat sources (radiators, car interiors during hot weather, etc).
- Avoid direct exposure to sunlight. Prolonged exposure to sunlight may affect the coloration of your product, particularly if it is pale and therefore more susceptible to slight yellowing.
- Avoid contact with water. If your product does come into contact with water, or in case of superficial dirt, dab it gently with a pale, absorbent, non-fluff cloth. No product containing soap or solvent should be used.
- To protect your product when not in use, the felt protective pouch provided.
Taking proper care of your Louis Vuitton product will allow you to fully appreciate its beauty for many years.
For any enquiries about your product, please do not hesitate to contact any Louis Vuitton store.

model.name: Brazza Wallet
model.disambiguatingDescription: Made from Taiga leather and Monogram canvas in a nuanced colorway, the Brazza Wallet’s instantly recognizable design takes on an understated graphic look. The elegant design of its interior includes 16 credit-cards slots, a large zipped compartment for coins, and four inside flat compartments for bills and tickets. Best of all, it fits into most jacket pockets.

additionalProperty.name: detailedDescription
additionalProperty.value:
• 16 credit card slots
  • 1 ID or business cards slot
  • 1 large zipped compartment for coins
  • 4 inside flat compartments for bills and tickets
  • 1 gusseted bill compartment
  • Taurillon Leather
  • Cowhide Leather lining and trimmings

The reference is either made in France, Spain, Italy or in the US.

panelInformations.title: Sustainability
panelInformations.description: The leather used in this product comes from a tannery audited and certified by the Leather Working Group (LWG), which is the highest environmental standard in terms of leather tanning. This standard requires tanneries to reduce their water and energy consumption, as well as their use of potentially hazardous substances. The tanneries we work with are located in Europe and are committed partners who work with us in our efforts for responsible sourcing and continuous improvement (implementation of material traceability systems, fighting against deforestation practices).

panelInformations.title: Product Care
panelInformations.description:
• Be careful not to scratch or rub your product against abrasive surfaces, especially the leather trim.
  • Protect your product from humidity and keep it away from direct sources of heat, such as radiators and the inside of cars in summer.
  • Avoid contact with liquid, hand cream, hand sanitizer, make-up and perfume.
  • To clean it, gently wipe the coated canvas with a soft cloth with slightly soapy water, and the black leather trim with a soft, dry cloth.
  • The adherent surface, created with microscopic suction cups, can be reactivated. With usage, the adherent surface grip strength may naturally diminish. This can be easily resolved by wiping the surface gently with a water damp cloth and air dry completely for ten minutes before replacing mobile phone. Grip strength is fully restored and your phone will adhere perfectly again.
  • When not in use, store the item in the dust bag provided with your purchase. Do not store in high temperatures, high humidity or unventilated areas.

For any enquiries about your product, please do not hesitate to contact any Louis Vuitton store.
panelInformations.introduction: To preserve the beauty of your product, we recommend following these guidelines for its care:

isRelatedTo.material: モノグラム・エクリプス

panelInformations.title: Sustainability
panelInformations.description: The leather used in this product comes from a tannery audited and certified by the Leather Working Group (LWG), which is the highest environmental standard in terms of leather tanning. This standard requires tanneries to reduce their water and energy consumption, as well as their use of potentially hazardous substances. The tanneries we work with are located in Europe and are committed partners who work with us in our efforts for responsible sourcing and continuous improvement (implementation of material traceability systems, fighting against deforestation practices).

panelInformations.title: Product Care
panelInformations.description:
• Beware not to scratch or rub your product against abrasives surfaces.
  • Keep your product away from damp or humid environments and avoid direct exposure to sunlight, keep your product away from any direct source of heat (radiators, car interiors overheated by the sun, etc).
  • Avoid prolonged contact with any materials that may transfer their colour pigments onto the patent leather, especially for light-colored Epi products.
  • Epi products, and especially products in electric colours, have to be kept away from contact with grease, hand cream, hand sanitizer, make-up and perfume.
  • If the leather gets dirty, or in instance of superficial stains on the lining, we recommend that you gently wipe with a soft and light-colored cloth. Never use soap or solvent.
  • In order to protect your product when you are not using it, store it in the felt protective pouch provided.

Taking proper care of your Louis Vuitton product will allow you to fully appreciate its beauty for many years.

For any enquiries about your product, please do not hesitate to contact any Louis Vuitton store.
panelInformations.introduction: To keep your Epi product beautiful as the years pass, we recommend following these guidelines for its care :

panelInformations.title: Sustainability
panelInformations.description: The leather used in this product comes from a tannery audited and certified by the Leather Working Group (LWG), which is the highest environmental standard in terms of leather tanning. This standard requires tanneries to reduce their water and energy consumption, as well as their use of potentially hazardous substances. The tanneries we work with are located in Europe and are committed partners who work with us in our efforts for responsible sourcing and continuous improvement (implementation of material traceability systems, fighting against deforestation practices).

panelInformations.title: Product Care
panelInformations.description:
- Avoid rubbing or scratching your product against abrasive surfaces.
- Avoid prolonged contact with any material that might transfer pigments to the Damier Infini leather (magazines, other leathers, etc).
- Protect your product from humidity and keep it away from heat sources (radiators, car interiors during hot weather, etc).
- Avoid direct exposure to sunlight. Prolonged exposure to sunlight may affect the coloration of your product, particularly if it is pale and therefore more susceptible to slight yellowing.
- Avoid contact with water. If your product does come into contact with water, or in case of superficial dirt, dab it gently with a pale, absorbent, non-fluff cloth. No product containing soap or solvent should be used.
- To protect your product when not in use, the felt protective pouch provided.
Taking proper care of your Louis Vuitton product will allow you to fully appreciate its beauty for many years.
For any enquiries about your product, please do not hesitate to contact any Louis Vuitton store.
panelInformations.introduction: To keep your Damier Infini product beautiful as the years pass, we recommend following these guidelines for its care :

panelInformations.title: Sustainability
panelInformations.description: The leather used in this product comes from a tannery audited and certified by the Leather Working Group (LWG), which is the highest environmental standard in terms of leather tanning. This standard requires tanneries to reduce their water and energy consumption, as well as their use of potentially hazardous substances. The tanneries we work with are located in Europe and are committed partners who work with us in our efforts for responsible sourcing and continuous improvement (implementation of material traceability systems, fighting against deforestation practices).

panelInformations.title: Product Care
panelInformations.description:
• Beware not to scratch or rub your product against abrasive surfaces.
  • For any superficial marks on the lining, we advise wiping with a dry, soft, light-colored cloth. Leather linings are not suitable for dry cleaning treatments.
  • Keep your product away from damp or humid environments and avoid direct exposure to sunlight, keep your product away from any direct source of heat (radiators, car interiors overheated by the sun, etc.).
  • Avoid contact with greasy substances, cosmetics, perfume, and hydroalcoholic solutions, as well as any material (magazines, other leathers, etc.) that may transfer their colored pigments onto the product.
  • Keep your product away from water. Should it get wet or dirty on the surface, dry with a lint free, light-colored, absorbent cloth. Never use soap or solvent.
  • In order to protect your product when you are not using it, store it in the felt protective pouch provided.

Taking proper care of your Louis Vuitton product will allow you to fully appreciate its beauty for many years.

For any enquiries about your product, please do not hesitate to contact any Louis Vuitton store.
panelInformations.introduction: To keep your Taurillon Leather product beautiful as the years pass, we recommend following these guidelines for its care:
